title: Seeking Clef Dingbat
content:
Good Morning,   
   
Any suggestions for a nice classic-looking musical clef? Thank you!
author: anonymous

comments.content: Thank you... Not only the name of the font, but where to get it too. I appreciate it.

There's [Sonata](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131103/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sonata/sonata/) from Linotype. This font has all of the necessary symbols used in musical notation, including a clef.   
Hope this helps.
